channel.title: [Delta]~!"`"!~Bl00dpk-Scape Server release~!"`"!~[Delta]
channel.description: Hello everyone, this IS my first release ever, as I am quiting rsps. PLEASE don't flame me. Let's start off with some pictures! __________________________________________________________________________ [img]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k594/bloodpker/releasepic1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k594/bloodpker/releasepic2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k594/bloodpker/releasepic3.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k594/bloodpker/releasepic4.jpg[/img] Max stat is 175. [img]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k594/bloodpker/releasepic5.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k594/bloodpker/releasepic6.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k594/bloodpker/releasepic7.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k594/bloodpker/releasepic9.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k594/bloodpker/releasepic10.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k594/bloodpker/releasepic11.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k594/bloodpker/releasepic13.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k594/bloodpker/releasepic14.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k594/bloodpker/releasepic21.jpg[/img] _________________________________________________________________________ There is more pictures but I forgot to take them....And now for the....... [b]FEATURES[/b] -4hit d claws -all godswords with correct stances and specs (no ss though) -decent economy -working skillcape emotes type ::skillcape while wearing a skillcape to use -175 for max stats -corporeal beast (drops spirits) -updated bank interfaces with banking buttons ______________________________________ and that's about it haha...not much but the pictures say most of it and Finally the download links: SOURCE: http://uppit.com/e690svrbje0d/Bl00dpk-Scape_server_files.rar CLIENT: http://uppit.com/tsz6o7bbvcx1/Bl00dpk-Scape_Client.rar __________________________________ not the best you've ever seen, but pretty good for first..so FEEL FREE TO LEACH LOL.

item.title: [Delta]~!"`"!~Bl00dpk-Scape Server release~!"`"!~[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“demps2k9, post:25, topic:377301”][quote author=PLayRooney link=topic=473207.msg3460961#msg3460961 date=1294472326]
Looks like to me that you’ve been asked to say this or your Blood.
OP: Looks Like a Common Delta. If you change the home from Edge it makes it seem a Little bit more special. Also Don’t add to many customs… = Lag and shitness (Thats my opinion)
[/quote]

Nope. The server laggs because of all the crap in the process. Also when a delta source has too many npcs (Around 500) it laggs anyway.

Edit: I will make a V2 of this. Only a quick short one. See how you like it.

Also my server has over 200 customs and mine doesn’t lagg one bit. Hosted on 3GB Ram.[/quote]

Thinking of a client with 200+ GOOD Customs like Pvp amor, D claws, etc. (Because those are considered customs) isn’t THAT bad.

Thinking of a client with 200+ Customs like Dildo, recolours, lightsaber, bandos shields etc. Is really gay.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]~!"`"!~Bl00dpk-Scape Server release~!"`"!~[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

[quote=“PLayRooney, post:14, topic:377301”]Looks like to me that you’ve been asked to say this or your Blood.
OP: Looks Like a Common Delta. If you change the home from Edge it makes it seem a Little bit more special. Also Don’t add to many customs… = Lag and shitness (Thats my opinion)[/quote]

Nope. The server laggs because of all the crap in the process. Also when a delta source has too many npcs (Around 500) it laggs anyway.

Edit: I will make a V2 of this. Only a quick short one. See how you like it.

Also my server has over 200 customs and mine doesn’t lagg one bit. Hosted on 3GB Ram.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]~!"`"!~Bl00dpk-Scape Server release~!"`"!~[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @drunk_mario drunk mario
item.description:
@drunk_mario wrote:

The custom economy thing was not a very good idea… and what’s with the max Combat level being 175? That’s like a random number and not a very good one… it’s too high.

item.title: [Delta]~!"`"!~Bl00dpk-Scape Server release~!"`"!~[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

I don’t like the gameframe
I don’t like the equipment screen
I HATE how the max cb level is 175
I HATE the customs
I Don’t like the castle wars pvp
I don’t like that gay custom economy shit
I don’t like how the corporal doesn’t have proper animations

I DO like the hit splats and hp bars.

It looks like you took a delta server with godsword specs and skillcape emotes, then added all this crap too it.

[quote=“killadragz14, post:19, topic:377301”]And you got to be kinding me dude you fail saying more custom= lag wow
dude get an life you dont know what your talking about.
More customs dont lag its the internet that lags
you moron
geez and people call them self’s expert coders
and think they know everything well buddy i have been coding 3 years now. and i stoped coding to and know so much still.[/quote]

  1. Learn to spell

  2. You sir, are an IDIOT, because if you add customs too a server, the client has to preload more models on startup

  3. You obviously haven’t been programming 3 years, because I have been programming 2 years now and know 800x more than you

  4. No one said they were expert programmers

  5. Bitch plz, you don’t know shit.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]~!"`"!~Bl00dpk-Scape Server release~!"`"!~[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

[quote=“killadragz14, post:19, topic:377301”]Bl00d its shane thats who killa is also the ips are different very different
you can cross check them if you like.
and like i said before all base types run off Delta, czards or other types none of the servers you see today are no other type of base there are only 3 types 2 i said before.

Um ok as i was looking in to this, this server is not an leeched server i would know, i know the maker of this server and as in fact blood did make this
and for those who dont beileve me then and say this is leech then please GTFO outta of this post and go into the bathroom and shot your self in the head.
As another thing he never used Tuts. in this server hes an good coder since i would know having years of coding my self and you cant really tell if something is leeched or not, thats like saying any server made today is leeched since they all run off Delta, czards or any other base type.
So as you can see flaming the author of this post is pointless.
since the server isnt really leeched and i got facts to back this up as well.
GF Noobs

-all godswords with correct stances and specs (no ss though)

Thats how I know you didn’t do this and its a leech, or its all tutorials.

Or maybe you didn’t add SS model. But I’m pretty sure this is EvoX.

Horrible release, sorry.

And for you are wrong its not the source your thinking of but the client. but the client isnt EvoX at all its a 508 client being used on a 317 server

And also if your thinking this isnt possible then you are wrong cause i can make one and show you.

Looks like to me that you’ve been asked to say this or your Blood.
OP: Looks Like a Common Delta. If you change the home from Edge it makes it seem a Little bit more special. Also Don’t add to many customs… = Lag and shitness (Thats my opinion)
And i agree With Recker450[quote author=recker450 link=topic=473207.msg3460683#msg3460683 date=1294450248]
a lot of client edits, the server edits were only moved npcs and objects
and d claws special
could use more work, otherwise the server looks like an common delta.
you should try and fix up a couple of skills that way itll look better

[/quote]
And you got to be kinding me dude you fail saying more custom= lag wow
dude get an life you dont know what your talking about.
More customs dont lag its the internet that lags
you moron
geez and people call them self’s expert coders
and think they know everything well buddy i have been coding 3 years now. and i stoped coding to and know so much still.[/quote]
Alright so your telling me if you ad 200 customs it Won’t it lag a Lil Bit?

Read full topic

@eyeownyew wrote:

Honestly, this isn’t too bad if it’s your first server. Also, it’s a Delta, so you can’t expect too much.
I do understand that it’s hard to start with anything but Delta though…

Anyway, even though you’re quitting RSPS, you should try to experiment with another base such as PI or Battlescape.
